description: This will work with experienced doctors coming in and taking blood from survivors that are willing to donate. These doctors will then transfer the blood to the infected and watch over them. I believe this will succeed as it has already worked in the outbreak in 1995.
summary: My idea is for the people who are already infected with the disease. I was reading an article on using the blood of survivors to cure those who are infected. The blood of those that have survived has already built up antibodies to fight the disease, so naturally the idea sounds good. This method was used to fight an outbreak of Ebola in 1995, where eight patients were given the blood or survivors. Seven survived through this treatment. This idea sounds like it would be beneficial to the infected, but also may run the risk of transferring HIV of hepatitis C. If done correctly with the proper equipment and personnel, I believe this method of treatment would benefit the infected tremendously.
title: Treatment with the Blood of Survivors
